"Who told her? My eyes are fine." walks over to Shadow Wing

"Whats this about you giving orders about my sight? I can see just fine. (As
he's talking to a lamp. just kidding.) If I have a problem with any
functions I'll let someone know. I'm fully capable of fulfilling my function
and until someone with COMMAND authority says otherwise I'll thank you to
not play medic.

He remembered what the computer told him. It said his optics took permanent
damage. If the CR chamber couldn't fix it then what chance was there that a
Doctorsaurus could?

He also knew that if Shadow Wing realized it then it was only a matter of
time before he was relieved of active duty for not being effective at what
he was programmed for.


----- Original Message -----
From: <TrikeJacob@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 19, 2000 9:44 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


Stegotron walks over to Lunarpine.
Stegotron: Your friend Shadow Wing told me to repair your damaged optics.
nbwrpg@egroups.com wrote:
>
> ::Shadow Wing::
>
> She could hardly contain herself. She hoped that this was the answer
> to her prayers. If only he could fix Lunarpine's eyes, she thought,
> he would be able to see again. She was just overjoyed inside.
> "uh, my friend is Lunarpine over there. He's very touchy right now
> about his lost vision. If you could maybe talk to him, in a round-a-
> about sort of way, about fixing his optics. I'd be forever gratefull
> to you." She was happy and worried at the same time. She hoped
> Lunarpine wouldn't be mad at her for pulling this stund on him like
> this.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, TrikeJacob@n... wrote:
> > Stegotron: Sure. Where is your freind and when do I start?
>
>
>
